title: Angel: The Curse
description: Collects all five issues of ANGEL: THE CURSE, plus bonus materials!Joss Whedon's classic vampire character returns to comics and IDW's got him! This book, collecting the Angel: The Curse series written by fan-favorite Angel author Jeff Mariotte, will be sure to appeal to fans of Buffy the Vampire Slayer and Angel alike!
author: Jeffrey J. Mariotte
